launch-e2e2.command: npx concurrently -k "wait-on tcp:4200 && cd packages/bounce-loader && yarn cypress open --e2e --browser chrome" "nx run bounce-loader:start"

e2e.command: cd packages/bounce-loader && npx playwright install chromium && npx playwright test && echo FINITO

e2e2.command: npx concurrently --kill-others --kill-signal SIGKILL --success first "npx wait-on tcp:4200 && cd packages/bounce-loader && yarn cypress run --record --config --e2e" "nx run bounce-loader:start"

test.command: cd packages/bounce-loader && yarn vitest run --changed --config vite.config.ts
